drugsPolicy.title: Drugs and Alcohol Policy
drugsPolicy.intro: BISO promotes a safe and inclusive student environment. We expect responsible conduct at all events and activities.

items.0: Follow Norwegian law and BIâ€™s regulations at all times
items.1: No use or distribution of illegal substances
items.2: Responsible alcohol service and consumption at BISO events

conduct.title: Conduct at events
conduct.body: All participants must show respect and care for fellow students and staff. Harassment, discrimination and unsafe behavior will not be tolerated.

support.title: Reporting and support
support.body: If you experience or witness incidents, use our Varsling (whistleblowing) page or contact campus leadership.
